title: Leather and beef as complements in production

content.prompt: Leather and beef are jointly produced such that an increase in the production of one results in an equal increase in the production of the other. An increase in the demand for leather will most likely cause

choices.label: a decrease in the price of leather
a decrease in the price of beef
a decrease in the equilibrium quantity of beef sold
an increase in the demand for beef in the short run
an increase in the supply of leather

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
